participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and dedicated, with a passion for helping others.
participant_1.background: i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, loves to share stories and make people laugh.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. i've a son who is in junior high school. my father used to work for home depot. i spent a decade working in the human services field.
